Class ProjectController

java.lang.Object
control.ProjectController
All Implemented Interfaces:
ProjectManagementController, ProjectQueryController
public class ProjectController extends Object implements ProjectQueryController, ProjectManagementController
The ProjectController class handles the creation, management, updating, and retrieval of BTO projects within the system. It also enforces constraints such as ensuring a manager cannot manage multiple open projects simultaneously. Interfaces implemented: - ProjectQueryController - ProjectManagementController

    Constructs a ProjectController and loads project data from the file.
